Ali + Moof 4.02.16

About Ali + Moof

When we met while working on the same-sex marriage campaign in Maine in 2012, we were deeply in love . . . Moof with Los Angeles, and Ali with Maine. Neither of us would have predicted that three years and many plane tickets later, we would be living together in a new city, planning a wedding that will now be recognized in all fifty states! But here we are, and our life together is just as joyous now as it was unimaginable then. Together, we've learned to love hiking and running, and we've taken on the task of eating all the tastiest food in PDX. Ali appreciates Moof's excellent fashion taste and technological know-how and Moof benefits from Ali's green thumb, knack for cooking, and spider-killing skills. What more could a couple need to be happy?! Just our amazing friends and loving families. Thank you for being part of our wedding: we can't wait to celebrate our love and commitment to each other with all of you!

Isla Mujeres, Mexico
Banks, Oregon
Philadelphia, Pennsylvania

Ceremony + Reception

  • 6:30 pm Ceremony on the Ocean Terrace
  • 7:00 pm Cocktails on the Sand Dollar Terrace
  • 7:45 pm Dinner in the Sand Dollar Ballroom
  • 9:00 pm Lantern lighting on the beach

Parking for guests is in the Surf & Sand's valet parking lot (free for wedding guests). Be careful turning off the Pacific Coast Highway, the driveway is steep!

We love your kids, and so children are welcome for all parts of the evening. And if you'd like, we will also have a babysitter on site. Please contact Ali if you're interested in child care so we can make arrangements (avanderzanden@gmail.com).

Accomodations

Surf & Sand Resort

(855)690-7114

1555 South Coast Highway, Laguna Beach, CA 92651

 The ceremony and reception will be held at the Surf & Sand Resort, a beautiful hotel right on the beach in Laguna. We have set aside a small number of rooms for guests in this boutique hotel ($350 a night plus taxes and fees.) Guest parking will be in the hotel parking lot, just off the Pacific Coast Highway.
Best Western Plus Laguna Brisas Spa Hotel

(949)497-7272

1600 South Coast Highway, Laguna Beach, CA 92651

 We've set aside a block of rooms for guests at this charming hotel, only steps away from the Surf & Sand Resort and the beach ($xxx a night, plus taxes and fees). This is the perfect place to stay if you want an easy walk to and from the wedding.
The Inn At Laguna Beach

(800)544-4479

211 North Pacific Coast Highway, Laguna Beach, CA 92651

 This luxurious modern hotel is a little over a mile from the wedding location, and we've set aside a block of rooms for guests here ($xxx a night). A great way to turn the wedding into a weekend getaway if you're coming from the Los Angeles area, or further!
14 West Laguna Beach

(877)318-1552

690 S Coast Hwy Laguna Beach, CA 92651

 This unique self-service hotel offers 14 studio-style rooms with a kitchenette and living area, making it a good choice for families or if you're planning a longer stay in Laguna Beach. It is about a half mile from the wedding location. We don't have a reserved block of rooms, so just call them if you're interested in making a reservation (rooms are in the low-to-mid $200s).
